bio.heading: Who is Rohan Shrestha?
description: I am a Full Stack Software Developer with hands-on experience building scalable, production-ready web applications using modern technologies such as React, Next.js, Node.js, and Python (Django/Flask).

Since starting my journey in web development, I have delivered multiple real-world projects ranging from company websites to data-driven platforms, focusing on clean design, performance, and user-friendly experiences.

Beyond professional work, I actively explore backend systems, automation tools like n8n, networking fundamentals, and machine learning basics, including building simple neural networks and maintaining a personal home lab for experimentation.

experience.title: Junior Software Developer
experience.description: Working as a full stack developer building and maintaining web applications using React, Next.js, Node.js, Django, and Flask. Collaborating in Agile teams, integrating REST APIs, deploying applications with Docker and cloud platforms, and ensuring performance, security, and maintainability.

experience.title: Freelance Full Stack Developer
experience.description: Delivered end-to-end freelance projects including UI/UX design, frontend development, backend implementation, and deployment. Built full-stack company websites and product platforms like Street to Home using Next.js and Python (Django). Managed client communication, requirements, and production-ready deliveries.
